data.content:
I'm an app developer and I keep my centre on USER FRIENDLY!!!

First of all, I'd like to address that anyone says this app is great and given 5stars is simply because they haven't use it before or not used it long enough.

What I don't like about WhatsApp:

• WhatsApp doesn't support iPad device;

• WhatsApp doesn't support Apple Watch;

• WhatsApp doesn't have "send read receipt" switch or just for individual conversation;

All of these list above are what should have been included long time ago
And now WhatsApp is officially became a Snapchat copycat.

What's the point of create a point to point encrypted messaging app for message content privacy and security and then bring out a Snapchat ish Story section for the public to see? Utterly stupid!!!

And I'm sure most people will agree with me that they use WhatsApp for the sake of the Ease of Access, simplified UI design and quick messaging structure.

Therefore WhatsApp don't need any fancy features other than direct communication.

And one more thing: don't do it the flipping big fix when you don't need to. App crash doesn't mean there is definitely a problem with your coding.

Horrible app
data.title: The worst app after recent update
